local_intent: Detect bread, move to a point 0.10 m above it, align with 0.01 tolerance, and verify visibility.
assumptions: Detection provides a usable target pose for approach.
Visibility check is sufficient to confirm successful approach/alignment.
coherence_with_global: Implements the approach phase of the global plan: DetectObject -> MoveAbove (0.10 m) -> ApproachAndAlign (0.01 tol) with 2000 ms timeouts, prior to grasping actions.
